snippet: The head of the federal consumer protection agency was fired Wednesday, weeks after his daughter got inspectors to briefly shut down a restaurant that refused her the table she wanted.
abstract: Humberto Benitez Trevino, Mexico's head of federal consumer protection agency, is fired, weeks after his daughter got inspectors to briefly shut down a restaurant that refused her the table she wanted.
lead_paragraph: The head of the federal consumer protection agency was fired Wednesday, weeks after his daughter got inspectors to briefly shut down a restaurant that refused her the table she wanted.

headline.seo: Mexico: Official Whose Daughter Forced Restaurant Closing Is Fired
headline.main: Mexico: Official Whose Daughter Forced Restaurant Closing Is Fired
headline.print_headline: Mexico: Official Whose Daughter Forced Restaurant Closing Is Fired
